snippet: A qualified majority of all 27 European Union finance ministers would have to approve the measure for the tax to take effect among nations that support it.
abstract: Italy and Spain join nine other European Union countries in backing a tax on financial trades, bringing the most significant attempt at such an initiative a step closer to success.
lead_paragraph: A qualified majority of all 27 European Union finance ministers would have to approve the measure for the tax to take effect among nations that support it.

headline.seo: Tax on Financial Trades Gains Support in Europe
headline.main: Italy and Spain Add Support to a Tax on Financial Trades in Europe
headline.print_headline: Italy and Spain Add Support to a Tax on Financial Trades in Europe
